definition[0]: an object used for printing the date on documents
definition[2]: to print the date on a document or an envelope
example[0]: The Government is developing an electronic postmark to time and date stamp email.
example[1]: The form must be date stamped by the Post Office.
definition[3]: to print the date on a product in order to show when it was made or the date by which it should be eaten, sold, or used
definition[4]: a stamp that has movable numbers, and is used to print the date on a document or envelope
definition[5]: a printed date that shows when something was done or made, or when it should be eaten, sold, or used by
example[2]: According to the date stamp on the report, it was delivered last December.
example[3]: The foods now have a date stamp and are guaranteed to reach British shops within six weeks of production.
